info.title: FastTrack Bond Data API
info.description:
FastTrack Bonds API provides REST access to FastTrack's bond database. We cover 30k+ bond cusips spanning corporates, junk, treasuries, and more. Pricing data goes back to 1988. 

Visit https://apitrial.fasttrack.net for a trial account.

403.description: Forbidden. Token and/or App ID is incorrect.

429.description: Too Many Requests. Limit requests to 5 concurrent request and 5 requests per second.

403.description: Forbidden. Token and/or App ID is incorrect.

429.description: Too Many Requests. Limit requests to 5 concurrent request and 5 requests per second.

403.description: Forbidden. Token and/or App ID is incorrect.

429.description: Too Many Requests. Limit requests to 5 concurrent request and 5 requests per second.

get.description: Bond pricing and data for cusips

prices.description: Array of prices and data points for requested dates

403.description: Forbidden. Token and/or App ID is incorrect.

429.description: Too Many Requests. Limit requests to 5 concurrent request and 5 requests per second.

post.description: Retrieve bond prices for more than one cusip over a specific date range

403.description: Forbidden. Token and/or App ID is incorrect.

post.description: Filter all bonds based on requested criteria. Maximum of 2500 data points will be returned.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Flag to include summary data and values of spreads and yield values.

schema.description: Array of all available options for filter object.

get.description: Available enum values for the various filter objects.

parameters.name: filter_object
parameters.description: Name of filter object options to retrieve

total_tickers.description: total cusips accessed in the month

usage_list.description: list of all cusips accessed in month

get.description: Total number and list of CUSIPsused in a month

total_tickers.description: total cusips accessed in the month

get.description: Total number of cusips used in a month

err.description: error responses. see full list of error codes [here](https://fasttrack.stoplight.io/docs/ftlightning/ZG9jOjMwNzY2Mw-error-codes)

code.description: numeric code of error. see full list of error codes [here](https://fasttrack.stoplight.io/docs/ftlightning/ZG9jOjMwNzY2Mw-error-codes)

FTBondPrice.title: FTBondPrice

convexity.description: Convexity is a measure of the curvature in the relationship between bond prices and bond yields. Convexity demonstrates how the duration of a bond changes as the interest rate changes

bid.description: convexity calculated using the bid quote

mid.description: convexity calculated using the midpoint between bid and ask quotes

duration.description: Duration measures a bond's price sensitivity to interest rate changes.

effective_bid.description: Effective duration is a measure of the duration for bonds with embedded options (e.g., callable bonds)

effective_mid.description: Effective duration is a measure of the duration for bonds with embedded options (e.g., callable bonds)

modified_bid.description: Modified duration measures the price change in a bond given a 1% change in interest rates

modified_mid.description: Modified duration measures the price change in a bond given a 1% change in interest rates

macaulay_bid.description: Macaulay duration estimates how many years it will take for an investor to be repaid the bond’s price by its total cash flows

macaulay_mid.description: Macaulay duration estimates how many years it will take for an investor to be repaid the bond’s price by its total cash flows

spreads.description: The spreads conatined describe the difference between the bond's yield and the current spread basis yield

oas_libor.description: Spread between OAS LIBOR and the bond's market yield

bid.description: OAS LIBOR spread using the bid quote

mid.description: OAS LIBOR spread using the mid quote

oas_treasury.description: Spread between US Treasuries and the bond's market yield

bid.description: OAS Treasury spreads using the bid quote

mid.description: OAS Treasury spreads using the mid quote

z.description: Z Spread - the constant spread that makes the price of a security equal to the present value of its cash flows when added to the yield at each point on the spot rate Treasury curve where cash flow is received

bid.description: Z spread using the bid quote

mid.description: Z spread using the mid quote

bid.description: yield to maturity calculated using the bid quote

mid.description: yield to maturity calculated using the midpoint between bid and ask quotes

bid.description: current yield calculated using the bid quote

mid.description: current yield calculated using the midpoint between bid and ask quotes

FTBondPrice.description: All price related date such as yield and spreads, plus duration and convexity

FTBondDescription.description: Descriptive data about the security such as rate, maturity, sector, industry, etc

status.description: Provides information about a bond's current state, which can include "Expired," "Matured," "Fully Called," "Converted," "Exchanged,"  "Liquidated" and more

details.description: Detailed information about an individual bond

amount_outstanding.description: The total amount of the bond outstanding

convertable.description: A boolean value indicating whether the bond is convertible or not.

currency.description: The currency in which the bond is denominated

date_maturity.description: The maturity date of the bond, represented as a string in YYYYMMDD format.

naics_code.description: NAICS code description classifying businesses based on the primary type of work the business performs

naics.description: ***Avaialble only in filter results*** Sector, sub-sector, and industiry information derived from NAICS codes

code.description: Full 6 digit NAICS code for issuer

payment_frequency.description: The frequency of interest payments for the bond.

regs.description: A boolean value indicating whether the issue is registered with the SEC.

rate.description: Annual interest rate paid on a the face value of security

rule_144A.description: Indicates whether the issue is trading under Rule 144A or not

sic_code.description: Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) describing the industriy a companiy belong to based on their business activities

sinking_fund.description: Indicates whether a bond has a sinking fund provision or not.

state_inc.description: The state of incorporation of the issuer, if applicable

coupon_first.description: indicates the date of the first coupon payment for the bond.

coupon_type.description: Type of coupon payment: fixed, floating, etc

coupon_day_count.description:
Represents the day count convention used to calculate the accrued interest of the bond.
Common day count conventions include "30/360", "Actual/Actual", "Actual/365", and "Actual/360"

coupon_type_other.description: A more detailed description of the bond's coupon type

dated_date.description: The date from which interest on the bond begins to accrue

debt_ranking.description: The debt ranking of the bond

issue_date.description: The date on which the bond was issued

issue_price.description: The issue price of the bond

issue_size.description: The total size of the bond issue

callable.description: A boolean value indicating whether the bond is callable or not. If it is callable, the issuer has the right to redeem the bond before its maturity date

date_first_par_call.description: The date on which the bond can first be called at par, or its face value.

date_current_call.description: The current call date of the bond, or the earliest date at which the issuer can call back the bon

makewhole_call.description: A boolean value indicating whether a make-whole call provision is in effect. This provision requires the issuer to compensate the bondholder for any lost interest payments if the bond is called before its maturity date.

reference.description: Other identifiers related to this bond

cusip.description: The unique eight-character identifier assigned to the bond by CUSIP Global Services

cusip_check.description: CUSIP, plus the last digit of the CUSIP identifier, used as a check digit to validate the identifier.

isin.description: The International Securities Identification Number assigned to the bond

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol associated with the bond, if available

FTBondFilterDescribe.description: A subset of FTBondDescribe that is returned in the bond filter result.

status.description: Provides information about a bond's current state, which can include "Expired," "Matured," "Fully Called," "Converted," "Exchanged,"  "Liquidated" and more

details.description: Detailed information about an individual bond

amount_outstanding.description: The total amount of the bond outstanding

currency.description: The currency in which the bond is denominated

date_maturity.description: The maturity date of the bond, represented as a string in YYYYMMDD format.

naics.description: ***Avaialble only in filter results*** Sector, sub-sector, and industiry information derived from NAICS codes

code.description: Full 6 digit NAICS code for issuer

payment_frequency.description: The frequency of interest payments for the bond.

rate.description: Annual interest rate paid on a the face value of security

sic_code.description: Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) describing the industriy a companiy belong to based on their business activities

coupon_type.description: Type of coupon payment: fixed, floating, etc

currency.description: The debt ranking of the bond

dated_date.description: The date from which interest on the bond begins to accrue

issue_date.description: The date on which the bond was issued

issue_price.description: The issue price of the bond

issue_size.description: The total size of the bond issue

callable.description: A boolean value indicating whether the bond is callable or not. If it is callable, the issuer has the right to redeem the bond before its maturity date

call_timing.description:
Specifies the time frame or periods during which the
bond issuer may exercise their right to repurchase
and retire the bond before its maturity date.

putable.description: Indicates if the bond is putable. If true, bondholders have the right to sell the bond back to the issuer at a predetermined price on specified dates.

date.description: Historical date to run filter as YYYMMDD formatted date. Any issue offered AFTER this date is excluded.

timetomaturity.description: Filter based on time to maturity. Measured in years from 'date' parameter. Min and Max values can be whole or decimal numbers

min.description: Min years to maturity. Use decimal for partial year. ie 1.5 = 1 year and 6 months

max.description: Maximum years to maturity. Use decimal for partial year. ie 1.75 = 1 year and 9 months.

coupon.description: Filter based on coupon value. Measued as percentage between 0.0 and 100.0

putable.description: Filter based on put option. True, False, or Null

callable.description: Filter based on call option, True, False, or Null

countries.description: Array of countries to include results

collateral.description: Array of collateral types to include in results

asset_type.description: Array of asset types to include in results

security_type.description: Array of security types to include in results

currency.description: Array of currencies to include in results

issuer_type.description: Array of issuer types to include in results

issuer_type_primary.description: Array of bond primary types to include in results

ratings.description: Filter by the defining upper and lower bounds of ratings by two rating agencies.

sp.description: Upper and lower bounds of allowed S&P's rating

min.description: Only show values greater than or equal

max.description: Only show values less than or equal

moodys.description: Upper and lower bounds of Moody's ratings

min.description: Only show values greater than or equal

max.description: Only show values less than or equal

naics.description: Array of 2, 3, and 4 digit NAICS codes. ***Results will include securities that match ANY of the codes in the list.*** 2 digit codes represent Sector, three digitis represent sub-sector, and 4 digits represent industiry. All filters are derived from the securities 6 digit NAICS codes.

FTBondFilterResults.description: Bonds that meet all critera of the filter

datalist.description: Array of bond description and price objects that result from the applying the requested filter to the entire FastTrack database

summary.description: Contains summary/aggregate information about filter result spreads and yields

date.description: Date used to calculate summary info

total_results.description: Total number of bonds that match filter criteria

included_results.description: Total number of cusips included in response. Maximum value is 2500

appid.name: appid
appid.description: 36 characher GUID received from welcome email. Sign up for trial at http://apitrial.fasttrack.net

token.name: token
token.description: 36 characher GUID received from the auth/login end point

start.name: start
start.description: First day in the date range of all calculations/requests

end.name: end
end.description: Last day in the date range of all calculations/requests. If not provided, the last market day in the database is used
